content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'gold_dataexjh77rhzzkvukipoc_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [gold_dataexjh77rhzzkvukipoc_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://gold@dataexjh77rhzzkvukipoc.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE vbrp (
	[VBELN] int,
	[NETWR] nvarchar(4000),
	[FKIMG] nvarchar(4000),
	[KOWRR] nvarchar(4000),
	[VRKME] int,
	[FKLMG] nvarchar(4000),
	[VGBEL] int,
	[AUBEL] int,
	[MATNR] int,
	[ARKTX] int,
	[KONDM] int,
	[VKGRP] int,
	[WAVWR] int,
	[ERDAT] nvarchar(4000),
	[ERZET] nvarchar(4000),
	[PRCTR] int,
	[KZWI2] nvarchar(4000),
	[KZWI3] nvarchar(4000),
	[KZWI5] nvarchar(4000),
	[KZWI6] nvarchar(4000),
	[BWTAR] int,
	[MEINS] int,
	[MWSBP] nvarchar(4000),
	[NTGEW] nvarchar(4000),
	[POSNR] int,
	[VGPOS] int,
	[WERKS] int,
	[GSBER] int,
	[MATKL] int,
	[PLTYP_AUFT] int,
	[J_1BCFOP] int,
	[SPART] int,
	[BRGEW] nvarchar(4000),
	[KVGR2] int,
	[KVGR3] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = '3caracoes/VBRP/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [gold_dataexjh77rhzzkvukipoc_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.vbrp
GO
